products.title: HTC Inspire 4G
products.description:
The HTC Inspire 4G is an upper mid-cost smart phone. This phone's HTC Sense feature groups every email, status update, tweet, text message and phone call by person for easy viewing and follow-up. The Inspire 4G's Friend Stream app allows you to quickly check what is happening on your social networks. The display of this smart phone is 4.3 inches of WVGA screen. The Inspire 4G's Dolby + SRS Surround sound with noise cancellation ensures clear audio. With 4G streams that are ten times faster than 3G, you can take in quality media without hassle. The Inspire 4G's DLNA connectivity allows you to stream videos, photos and music wirelessly to a larger display (which must also be DLNA certified, of course). This smart phone's 8MP camera is equipped with LED flash, in-camera editing and live picture effects. The Inspire 4G's camera is also equipped with 720p camcorder ability, for shooting HD video. Once you have caught pictures or video, you can send it to social networks with instantaneous uploads. The HTC Inspire 4G smart phone is equipped with a 1230mAh rechargeable lithium-ion battery.

Features

  • Qualcomm QSD8255 1GHz Snapdragon processor
  • Android 2.2 (Froyo) w/ HTC Sense
  • 4G speed
  • 768MB/RAM 4GB/ROM
  • 4.3" WVGA resolution w/ pinch-to-zoom
  • HSPA+ 850/1900 MHz
  • GSM/GPRS/EDGE 850/900/1800/1900 MHz
  • GPS GPS/AGPS
  • 720p camcorder
  • 8MP color camera w/ auto focus and flash
  • Bluetooth 2.1
  • Wi-Fi 802.11 b/g/n
  • 3.5mm stereo audio jack
  • Micro USB
  • Rechargeable lithium-ion battery (1230 mAh)
  • Up to 360 minutes talk time
  • Up to 15.5 days standby time
  • Dimensions: 4.8” x 2.7” x .46 
  • Weight: 5.78 ounces (with battery)

pros.text: fast - boots quickly, no interface lag
capable of shooting 720p high definition video

cons.text: poor battery life - won't last a day of heavy use
headphone lack is poorly placed at the bottom of the device
